page.syntax: L DropUserFromGroup(UserName as C, GroupName as C)
page.description: Remove the user from the group in the currently connected database or server.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::DropUserFromGroup() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .DropUserFromGroup( UserName as C, GroupName as C ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. UserNameThe user's login name. GroupNameThe name of the group.
Description The DropUserFromGroup() method removes the user from the group in the currently connected database or server. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='SQLServer', Server='doc3000', Trusted_connection=yes, Database='Northwind'}" conn.open(connString) conn.DropUserToGroup("Edward", "Techwriting")
See Also SQL::Connection Object
